akn:content.akn:p:
§ 220309. Duty to maintain corporate status The corporation shall maintain its status as a corporation incorporated under the laws of the District of Columbia or a State. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1465.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
22030936:1216 (last sentence).Oct. 20, 1978, Pub. L. 95–493, § 16 (last sentence), 92 Stat. 1647.
The word “retain” is omitted as unnecessary.
